nodes.bodyText: Seems like we would need a new relocation.

Are you referring to shadowing PGV?

The parent package io.envoyproxy is relocated.
should change year to 2020 or keep it as it is because it was an existing file from 2018? Not sure what the right thing to do is
Good question. I don't know the answer, will keep it as is.
